parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240060), indicating it's likely electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions and promotes the REPER party candidates, Gheorghina Marian and Florin Barbur, and encourages voters to choose position 10 on the ballot, which corresponds to the REPER party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE.  This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed for wide public reach. The message is not a private communication but aims to influence a large number of voters.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters to support the REPER party candidates by explicitly instructing them to vote for position 10 on the ballot.  The use of the phrase "Votează cu încredere" (Vote with confidence) further reinforces this intention.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's not presenting news or analysis but directly advocating for a specific political party and its candidates. The call to action ("Votează reper") is not consistent with journalistic standards.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct endorsement of specific candidates and a political party, aiming to influence electoral outcomes.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1271996963928121</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes REPER party candidates Gheorghina Marian and Florin Barbur, urging voters to select position 10 on the ballot. The presence of a CMF number, the explicit call to vote for specific candidates, and the paid nature of the post strongly suggest it's electoral propaganda. The post's objective is clearly to influence voters' choices in the parliamentary elections.  While the post's end date is after the election, the fact that it was published and promoted during the election period makes it a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>GHEORGHINA MARIAN</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>FLORIN BARBUR</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Atelierul de internet SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea și promovarea pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări (ID 1271996963928121) care constituie propagandă electorală pentru candidații REPER Gheorghina Marian și Florin Barbur, îndemnând alegătorii să voteze poziția 10 pe buletinul de vot.  Postarea, care conține numărul CMF 11240060, are ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea candidaților menționați, având ca obiectiv clar promovarea acestora în perioada electorală.  Fraza „Votează cu încredere”  și îndemnul direct la vot pentru o anumită poziție pe buletinul de vot demonstrează intenția de a influența alegătorii.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
